intro:
Find mistakes in Japanese landscapes!
Enjoy brain training while being healed by Japanese landscapes!
description:
While being healed by the pictures of Japanese landscapes
You can easily train your brain with the pictures of Japanese landscapes.
There are a lot of pictures of Japanese landscapes!

Easy to play:
・Look closely at the ""upper"" photo on the split screen.
・Find the difference between the bottom photo and the top photo.
・When you find the wrong place, touch it!

The hint button is only for when you just can't figure it out!
I give you a big hint that you can understand most of the puzzles.

The game supports both button controls and touch controls, allowing you to play in TV mode, handheld mode, or tabletop mode.
※This game is designed to be played on the Nintendo Switch™ in vertical orientation.
